title: Setup Next.js project structure
body:
## Description

Configure Next.js project with proper organization and tooling.

## Tasks

- Create component directories (components/, utils/, types/)
- Configure ESLint and Prettier
- Setup TypeScript strict mode
- Add global styles
- Configure path aliases (@/*)

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] All directories created with proper structure
- [ ] ESLint configuration validates without errors
- [ ] TypeScript compiles without errors
- [ ] Path aliases work correctly

## Type

Feature

## Platform

Web

## Priority

High

---

_Created by claude-plan-to-issues workflow_
_Milestone: Todo App MVP_
